settings.heading: About Saloni Furniture US
settings.subheading:
Saloni Furniture US is a Turkish Furniture manufacturer which was established in 2000 with a passion for creating beautiful and functional furniture.

Today Saloni Furniture is a renowned brand known for its high-quality and luxurious furniture pieces. The Saloni Furniture company has its origins in Turkey, where it was founded in 2000 by the founders who have sense of reputation at personal and corporate level. 

As Saloni Furniture: we continue our way with firm and confident steps with the production principle that we have never compromised for 24 years. With our increasing production capacity day by day and our sales points exceeding the country borders.

settings.heading: Saloni Production
settings.subheading:
We change the perception of furniture production by using art and artist in our operation techniques in our production processes.

Because we move forward with a large team that can fully realize our furniture productions and its literature. By doing so, we believe that our brand adds value to the sector what automatically means that it adds value to your living spaces and we will continue doing this by helps of our devoted workforce of more than 600 employees.

 As a result, we believe that Saloni USA Furniture adds value to the industry. With over 400 employees and hundreds of thousands of furniture produced in the last 22 years, we will continue to maintain the satisfaction Saloni USA have achieved and add value to your living spaces.
